item.title: Alessia Cara - Scars To Your Beautiful
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Scars To Your Beautiful on the ukulele by Alessia Cara. The chords used are Am F G.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Alessia Cara - How Far I'll Go
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
As performed by Alessia Cara
The audio has been adjusted to move from the original Key of E to F, and then to remove the key change at the end. Note the barre chords: Bbm, Bb, F, and Fmaj7 (These last two occur at the end)
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The
